Gesper: Firedrill... welcome. Melchana, my sister, will be coming soon 
to pick you up. When you arrive at our base, Daemos and Belthassan 
will instruct you further.

--- In nbwrpg@y..., robertdahl <rdahl@t...> wrote:
> A robot darkened the doorway from behind the others. "I would." said 
the
> voice, with little emotion left, and a sound of a robot who is 
drained.
> 
> "Firedrill..." Hoist exclaimed. "Where have you been? Did you catch 
up
> with those kidnappers?" 
> 
> Firedrill shot Hoist a chilling look, which made Hoist realise the
> stupid question. Just looking at Firedrill you could tell he was 
bashed
> up, and Cliffjumpers disapearance was bothering him.
> 
> Beachcomber joined the rest, also looking worse for wear.
